original: 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa /üîΩ'di ltar phra ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa / 'di ltar phra ba /
translated: It is not the domain of logicians.üîΩIt is subtle.

original: 'di ltar zhib pa /üîΩ'di ltar blta dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhib pa / 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
translated: It is fine.üîΩIt is difficult to see.

original: 'di ltar rjes su rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: It is difficult to realize.

original: 'di ltar gya nom pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar gya nom pa /
translated: It is sublime.

original: 'di ltar 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa /
translated: It is within the capacity of noble beings.üîΩIt is to be known by the wisdom of the wise and the sagacious.

original: 'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di len par byed pa su dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gang brjod pa de la sgro skur las grol ba nyid dang / sems dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di len par byed pa su dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gang brjod pa de la sgro skur las grol ba nyid dang / sems dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid dang /
translated: Who will take up this perfection of wisdom that is free from exaggeration and denigration, that is not an object of mind or concepts,

original: rnal 'byor gyi chos kyis nges par bya ba nyid kyis rtog ge las 'das @112a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi chos kyis nges par bya ba nyid kyis rtog ge las 'das @112a * //
translated: and that is to be ascertained by the Dharma of yoga?

original: pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi ngo bo phra ba nyid dang / rigs nas brtsams te chos kyi sku thob kyi bar du lam bar chad med pa dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mthong bar byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
analyzed: pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi ngo bo phra ba nyid dang / rigs nas brtsams te chos kyi sku thob kyi bar du lam bar chad med pa dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mthong bar byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
translated: the subtle nature of the essential nature, the uninterrupted path beginning from the lineage up to the attainment of the Dharma body, the non-conceptualization of the object to be seen and the seer,

original: mthong ba'i tshig gis kyang don de thob par mi nus pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'bras bu can nyid dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i dbang du byas nas tshig dgu po rnams go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i tshig gis kyang don de thob par mi nus pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'bras bu can nyid dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i dbang du byas nas tshig dgu po rnams go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: the fact that the meaning cannot be attained even by the word ‚Äúseeing,‚Äù the fact that the knowledge of all aspects is fruitful, and the fact that it is the cause of the realization of all noble persons.

original: tshig bcu pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig bcu pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du bshad par bya'o //
translated: The tenth word should be explained as the characteristic of distinction.

original: 'di ltar 'dir ji ltar chos 'ga' yang ma bshad ma bstan ma brjod pa de kho na 'dir len par byed pa su'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang / 'brel pa dang / de gnyi ga las tshig gsum po rnams yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir ji ltar chos 'ga' yang ma bshad ma bstan ma brjod pa de kho na 'dir len par byed pa su'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang / 'brel pa dang / de gnyi ga las tshig gsum po rnams yin no //
translated: Thus, here, ‚Äúno one at all will take up what is taught here, that is, that no dharma at all is taught, indicated, or expressed,‚Äù is the three phrases of intrinsic nature, relation, and both of those.

original: bkur ba'i cha lnga pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: bkur ba'i cha lnga pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With regard to the five parts of respect,

original: koo shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / de dag nyid kyi bstan pa gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin rnam par 'byed pa dang /
analyzed: koo shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / de dag nyid kyi bstan pa gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin rnam par 'byed pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄúKau≈õika, the one who teaches, explains, analyzes, and elucidates the meaning of the perfection of wisdom,‚Äù and so on, is the intrinsic identity, the identity of the divisions, and the teaching of those very things, which is the analysis for disciples just as they are.

original: de'i khar 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i sgo nas tshig bzhi po rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i khar 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i sgo nas tshig bzhi po rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rig par bya'o //
translated: In addition, one should know the four phrases in order through the door of skill in engagement.

original: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here, the meaning of the perfection of wisdom is this.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: de gang gis gnyis su med par mthong gi /
analyzed: de gang gis gnyis su med par mthong gi /
translated: It is that which is seen as nondual,

original: gnyis su ni ma yin pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su ni ma yin pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: not as dual.

original: mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par yang ma yin /üîΩ'ong bar ma yin 'gro bar ma yin pa dang / bsal bar ma yin bzhag par ma yin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /üîΩrnam par byang bar ma yin pa dang / skye bar ma yin 'gag par ma yin pa dang / len par ma yin 'dor bar ma yin pa dang / gnas par ma yin mi gnas par ma yin pa dang / yang dag par ma yin yang dag pa ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par yang ma yin / 'ong bar ma yin 'gro bar ma yin pa dang / bsal bar ma yin bzhag par ma yin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin / rnam par byang bar ma yin pa dang / skye bar ma yin 'gag par ma yin pa dang / len par ma yin 'dor bar ma yin pa dang / gnas par ma yin mi gnas par ma yin pa dang / yang dag par ma yin yang dag pa ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
translated: It is not with signs, nor is it signless.üîΩIt is not coming, nor is it going. It is not removed, nor is it set. It is not afflicted,üîΩnor is it purified. It is not arising, nor is it ceasing. It is not accepted, nor is it rejected. It is not abiding, nor is it not abiding. It is not real, nor is it unreal.

original: ldan par ma yin mi ldan par ma yin pa dang / bag tsam ma yin bag tsam ma yin par ma yin pa dang / @112b cha so so ma yin cha so so ma yin par ma yin pa dang / chos nyid ma yin chos nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: ldan par ma yin mi ldan par ma yin pa dang / bag tsam ma yin bag tsam ma yin par ma yin pa dang / @112b cha so so ma yin cha so so ma yin par ma yin pa dang / chos nyid ma yin chos nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
translated: It is not possessed, nor is it not possessed. It is not a little, nor is it not a little. It is not individual, nor is it not individual. It is not reality, nor is it not reality.

original: de bzhin nyid ma yin de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa ma yin par mthong ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma yin de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa ma yin par mthong ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is seeing that it is not reality and it is not not reality, and it is seeing that it is not the limit of reality and it is not not the limit of reality.

original: byed pa po dang thob par byed pa'i rgyu bkag pa rjes su shes pa dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba bkag pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag sel ba dang / len pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag phan tshun gyi rang bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: byed pa po dang thob par byed pa'i rgyu bkag pa rjes su shes pa dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba bkag pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag sel ba dang / len pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag phan tshun gyi rang bzhin nyid dang /
translated: This is the understanding of the refutation of the agent and the instrument of attainment, the refutation of going and coming, the elimination of adverse factors and their antidotes, the mutual nature of the afflicted and the pure,üîΩthe nonarising and noncessation of reality, the appropriation of views, the nonrejection of its nature, the nonconceptualization of the abode of the potential as either existent or nonexistent,

original: chos nyid la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang / lta bas byas pa'i len pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid kyis dor ba med pa dang / rigs kyi rten gyi gnas dngos po ma yin pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
analyzed: chos nyid la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang / lta bas byas pa'i len pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid kyis dor ba med pa dang / rigs kyi rten gyi gnas dngos po ma yin pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
translated: and the nonconceptualization of the abode of the potential as either existent or nonexistent.

original: gsung rab kyi chos bden pa dang brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / tshogs pa'i ldan pa dang ldan pa med pa las 'das pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis phyogs gcig dang thams cad tshang bar nges par 'byung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: gsung rab kyi chos bden pa dang brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / tshogs pa'i ldan pa dang ldan pa med pa las 'das pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis phyogs gcig dang thams cad tshang bar nges par 'byung ba med pa dang /
translated: The Dharma of the scriptures is neither true nor false, it transcends being possessed or not possessed by the assembly, and the dharmadhatu is not ascertained as being partially or completely emerged by sravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rigs so so'i rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings char byar med pa dang / lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i gang zag gi dbye bas phan tshun lam dang lam ma yin par mi 'gyur ba dang / de kho na bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rigs so so'i rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings char byar med pa dang / lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i gang zag gi dbye bas phan tshun lam dang lam ma yin par mi 'gyur ba dang / de kho na bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med pa dang /
translated: The dharmadhatu is not divided into different types of natures, the Dharma of the path does not mutually become the path or not the path due to the division of arya individuals, and the undeluded dharmadhatu is not divided in reality.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gyur pa'i chos nyid ro gcig pa nyid kyis mtha' khyad par med pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gyur pa'i chos nyid ro gcig pa nyid kyis mtha' khyad par med pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: From the perspective of the single taste of the dharmata that has become just as it is, there is no difference in the extremes.

original: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig zung bcu bzhi po rnams kyis nges par bstan pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig zung bcu bzhi po rnams kyis nges par bstan pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: The fourteen pairs of phrases such as ‚Äúnot with signs, not signless‚Äù should be explained in order.

original: de bzhin du rnam grangs kyi tshig bshad pa ma byas pa gzhan rnams kyi don zung gi rjes su 'brangs nas ji ltar rigs par mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad par 'os te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam grangs kyi tshig bshad pa ma byas pa gzhan rnams kyi don zung gi rjes su 'brangs nas ji ltar rigs par mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad par 'os te /
translated: Similarly, the other terms that have not been explained should be understood by the wise in accordance with the meaning of the pairs of terms, as is appropriate.

original: kho bo cag gis ni gzhung lci ba'i skyon spangs pa'i don du thams cad nye bar bstan par spungs ma bskyed do //üîΩ@113a * // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis ni gzhung lci ba'i skyon spangs pa'i don du thams cad nye bar bstan par spungs ma bskyed do // @113a * // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las /
translated: We have not generated a heap of words here for the sake of avoiding the fault of a heavy text.

original: lam shes pa'i skabs mtha' gnyis rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: lam shes pa'i skabs mtha' gnyis rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o //
translated: This concludes the chapter on the complete purification of the two extremes, the second chapter of the treatise ‚ÄúOrnament of Clear Realization‚ÄîA Commentary on the Prajnaparamita.‚Äù

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path has been explained.

original: // / da ni thams cad shes pa nyid bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / da ni thams cad shes pa nyid bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the knowledge of all aspects should be explained.

original: de la re zhig 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de la re zhig 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: In this regard, first, from the perspective of not abiding in samsara and nirvana,

original: tshu rol pha rol mtha' la min //
analyzed: tshu rol pha rol mtha' la min //
translated: It is not in the extreme of this shore or the other shore.

original: de dag bar na mi gnas pa //
analyzed: de dag bar na mi gnas pa //
translated: It does not abide between those two.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.üîΩThe Bhagavan said, ‚ÄúThe perfection of wisdom of bodhisattvas is not this shore, not the other shore, and not found between those two.‚ÄùüîΩAnd, ‚ÄúBecause it is utterly pure,‚Äù and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi mtha' ma lags gnyis ka las gzhan du'ang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes dang dmigs pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin no//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi mtha' ma lags gnyis ka las gzhan du'ang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes dang dmigs pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin no//
translated: In this way, he refuted the conceptions of samsara and nirvana and the reference points.

original: de la mi dmigs pa'ang gang gi phyir /üîΩdus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir //üîΩshes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod //
analyzed: de la mi dmigs pa'ang gang gi phyir / dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir // shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod //
translated: In this regard, nonapprehending is also becauseüîΩIt is asserted that the perfection of wisdom

original: ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba yin te /
translated: Is the knowledge of the equality of the three times.

original: dus gsum pa'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gsum pa'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because phenomena of the three times are equality.

original: zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: thabs ma yin pas ring ba ste //
analyzed: thabs ma yin pas ring ba ste //
translated: Far from the means.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes par bgyid na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes par bgyid na /
translated: Blessed One, if sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, through a method of objectifying this perfection of wisdom, were to understand it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dor bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dor bar 'gyur /
translated: they would abandon this perfection of wisdom,

original: ring du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ring du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: they would make it distant.

original: de'i tshe dang phyi ma'i tshe la ltos nas tshig gnyis so //
analyzed: de'i tshe dang phyi ma'i tshe la ltos nas tshig gnyis so //
translated: This is the two statements in terms of this life and the next.

original: thabs ma yin pa'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: thabs ma yin pa'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is the means?üîΩIt is said:

original: de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas //
analyzed: de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas //
translated: Through objectifying signs.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /üîΩrab 'byor ming las kyang chags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te / rab 'byor ming las kyang chags so //
translated: This is what is being said:üîΩSubh≈´ti, they are attached to names.

original: rab 'byor mtshan las kyang chags so //
analyzed: rab 'byor mtshan las kyang chags so //
translated: Subh≈´ti, they are attached to signs.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //üîΩde ni thabs la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no // de ni thabs la mkhas pa yis //
translated: Subh≈´ti, all dharmas are signless and nameless.üîΩThat is explained as

original: yang dag dge ba nyid du bshad //
analyzed: yang dag dge ba nyid du bshad //
translated: the true virtue of skillful means.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bcom ldan 'das @113b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang / legs par mthar phyung ba'i bar ni ngo mtshar ro zhes bya bas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @113b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang / legs par mthar phyung ba'i bar ni ngo mtshar ro zhes bya bas /
translated: Blessed One, it is amazing that this perfection of wisdom is well-explained and well-completed.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rtogs pa nyi tshe ba dang bzlog pas mthar thug par song ba de la legs par bshad pa dang legs par mthar phyung bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rtogs pa nyi tshe ba dang bzlog pas mthar thug par song ba de la legs par bshad pa dang legs par mthar phyung bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: By reversing the limited realizations of ≈õrƒÅvakas and so forth, it goes to the ultimate. That is what is said to be well-explained and well-completed.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni /üîΩgzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang // dus gsum gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang // sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni / gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang // dus gsum gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang // sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la //
translated: The opposing factors are:üîΩThe perception of engagement in the emptiness of form and so forth,

original: spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
analyzed: spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
translated: the dharmas included in the three times, and the factors of enlightenment such as generosity,üîΩis the opposing factor.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa la /
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa la /
translated: This is what is said.

original: thabs mi mkhas pas de gzugs stong zhes bya bar zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas de gzugs stong zhes bya bar zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: The method of skill in means is taught beginning from He does not consider form as empty, and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid dang / 'das pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i 'du shes ni chags pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid dang / 'das pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i 'du shes ni chags pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The attachment is the notion that I will practice the emptiness of form and so on, the dharmas of the past and so on, the perfections, up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyen po ni /
analyzed: gnyen po ni /
translated: The antidote is

original: sbyin pa la sogs la bar 'dzin med //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs la bar 'dzin med //
translated: the absence of grasping at the perfections and so on.

original: ces gang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ces gang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: sh'a ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du gzugs la gzugs zhes shes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /üîΩbdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du gzugs la gzugs zhes shes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te / bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: ≈öƒÅriputra, the bodhisattva who is skilled in means does not think, Form should not be known as form, and so on, beginning from there.

original: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: He does not think, I will attain the knowledge of all aspects, and so on, up to I will attain the knowledge of all aspects. And the reason is stated: Because of the emptiness of all.

original: yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsungs pa ni /
translated: The unfavorable side is stated again:

original: koo shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems su shes pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: koo shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems su shes pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Kau≈õika, here, a son or daughter of good lineage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, having understood the mind, up to

original: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod par mi nus so //
analyzed: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod par mi nus so //
translated: if they become attached to those attachments, they will not be able to practice the perfection of wisdom free from attachment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of form up to the knowledge of all aspects cannot be dedicated.

original: gnyen po ni /
analyzed: gnyen po ni /
translated: The antidote is:

original: gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa //
analyzed: gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa //
translated: Others apply themselves to that,

original: de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas //
analyzed: de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas //
translated: stopping the extreme of attachment.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /üîΩde nyid la nga rgyal bkag pa ston pa la sogs pas gzhan rnams kyi chags @114a * //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa yin te / de nyid la nga rgyal bkag pa ston pa la sogs pas gzhan rnams kyi chags @114a * //
translated: That is what is stated.

original: pa'i thams cad spong bar byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i thams cad spong bar byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The teaching on the cessation of pride in that and so on is what is stated in the teaching on the abandonment of all the attachments of others.

original: de la kun tu rmongs pa dang / bag med pa dang / kun tu zhum pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par lan du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
analyzed: de la kun tu rmongs pa dang / bag med pa dang / kun tu zhum pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par lan du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
translated: Therein, the four kinds of thorough affliction are: delusion, negligence, depression, and thorough affliction by the counteragent.

original: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa rnams go rims bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa rnams go rims bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The four kinds of purification are: teaching the truth to those who have entered the correct path, engaging in the correct path, encouraging the correct path, and delighting in the correct path.

original: gzhan yang / rgyal la sogs pa chags pa phra //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang / rgyal la sogs pa chags pa phra // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Moreover, attachment to the victor, etc., is subtle.

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yongs su bsngo ba rnams ni chags pa phra mo nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yongs su bsngo ba rnams ni chags pa phra mo nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said: Subhuti, if the bodhisattva mentally attends to the Tathagata as a name, etc., then the Tathagata, his wholesome roots, and the dedication are said to be subtle attachment.

original: 'di dag chags pa nyid yin pa ni gang gi phyir /üîΩchos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: 'di dag chags pa nyid yin pa ni gang gi phyir / chos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis //
translated: This is attachment becauseüîΩthe path of Dharma is profound

original: dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid //
translated: by virtue of its intrinsic emptiness.

original: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.üîΩThe Lord said, ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, the perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo zhes bya ba dang / rab 'byor chos thams cad rab bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo zhes bya ba dang / rab 'byor chos thams cad rab bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Subh≈´ti, it is because all phenomena are void by nature.‚Äù

original: yang ji ltar na chags pa thams cad spong ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na chags pa thams cad spong ba yin zhe na /
translated: And how does one abandon all attachments?

original: chos rnams rang bzhin gcig par ni //
analyzed: chos rnams rang bzhin gcig par ni //
translated: By knowing the single nature of phenomena,

original: shes pas chags pa spong ba yin //
analyzed: shes pas chags pa spong ba yin //
translated: one abandons attachment.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
translated: Subh≈´ti, the nature of phenomena is not dual.
